news.title: At a glance: Key points from government's defence strategy
news.summary: Sir Keir Starmer has announced the findings of a "root and branch" review of the UK's defence capabilities

news.title: Mount Etna erupts sending large plumes of ash and smoke into sky
news.summary: The full scale of the eruption is currently unclear and disruption appears to be minimal.

news.title: New search in Portugal in Madeleine McCann case
news.summary: German police will launch a new search this week in the holiday town where she went missing in 2007.

news.title: Ukraine and Russia still far apart after peace talks but agree prisoner swap
news.summary: The two warring sides remain far apart on how to end the conflict after a second round of talks in Turkey.

news.title: Young driver detained for causing police pile-up during first date
news.summary: Mazyar Azarbonyad is detained for 14 months for causing the crash which injured seven officers.

news.title: Minister apologises for grooming gangs report delay
news.summary: Home Office minister Jess Phillips tells MPs an audit into grooming gangs will be published "very shortly".

news.title: UK's spring was warmest on record, Met Office says
news.summary: From March to May the country experienced the warmest temperatures and sunniest days since records began.

news.title: Bill Gates to give most of his $200bn fortune to Africa
news.summary: The Microsoft founder urges young innovators to use Artificial Intelligence to improve health services.

news.title: Major study shows exercise improves colon cancer survival rates
news.summary: Risk of dying was cut by a third after colon cancer patients dialled up exercise levels.

news.title: Police confirm 109 people injured in Liverpool parade crash
news.summary: Police say the number of people injured when a car drove into crowds in Liverpool has risen.
